label: Open iTerm
args:
$"tell application "iTerm"
 activate
 delay 0.5
 tell current session of current window
 write text "cd ($env.PWD)"
 end tell
 end tell"

label: Open Lazygit in iTerm
args:
$"tell application "iTerm"
 activate
 delay 0.5
 tell current session of current window
 write text "cd ($env.PWD); lazygit"
 end tell
 end tell"

label: Open Gitui in iTerm
args:
$"tell application "iTerm"
 activate
 delay 0.5
 tell current session of current window
 write text "cd ($env.PWD); gitui"
 end tell
 end tell"
